author: tchent (ttt)
content:
公司名稱，統編(中華民國以外註冊可免填):Robert Walters, 53546368
公司地址(填寫詳細至號): 台北市信義區松智路1號10樓

Position: Software Engineer ( Nodejs/ Golang)
Location: Xinyi


Responsibilities:
·         Develop applications utilizing Node.js or Golang
·         Design and implementation of low-latency, high-availability, and performant applications
·         Deliver solutions in an Agile - Scrum project methodology


Requirements:
·         3+ years backend working experience
·         2+ years of experience developing production-level application
·         Usage of various electronic transports, data formats, protocols and architectures such as HTTP, SOAP, XML, JSON, REST, Email, S/FTP/S, SSL
·         Proficiency in Nodejs or Golang
·         Familiar with designing RESTful APIs
·         Experience with databases and SQL/NoSQL
·         Application of code and deployment management tools, such as Git, SVN, Mercurial, Maven, Ant, Bamboo

Salary: 1.2-1.5M, depending on related experience

員工是否需自備工具? (是/否) :否
加班費制度: 比照勞基法


人資或徵才聯絡方式: Ruby Lin of Robert Walters, a global headhunting company.
Dir: +886 2 8758 0706
E-mail: 

Web: www.robertwalters.com.tw

Also welcome to refer any of your friends who might be interested in this role. We will provide NTD10,000 referral fee for each successful placement.  : )


--

title: [徵才] Robert Walters代徵Nodejs/Golang工程師
